channel.title: HKG:1929 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:1929 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Hot Arbitrage Trade Has Made Hong Kong Jeweler a Top Short-Seller Target
item.description: Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.’s first major fundraising since its 2011 listing has turned the Hong Kong jeweler into one of the city’s most-shorted stocks.
